title: Kalson9
author: Kalson9
content: Arsenal like we saw in there past season and there performance and what they did and there unbeating run and what as they were in the edge of winning the EPL and later come out second.Now if you look into Manchester city the title holders and there team and see the kind of squad they have sqaud depth which are competitive players not back up players all players in the team are not just back up but always competitive and when you don't have Foden you play Grealish and when no Foden Gundogan is available ,so if Arsenal will have a squad depth and go with a team work like what they are building now with the recruitment of Declan Rice and Kai harvertzÂ  I think they are title contenders and EPL champion.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: It's a pity that after a year that this account was created you are yet to know the different boards we have in their numbers where posts can be properly made or discuss, beginners and help section is not a gambling section, try move the thread to gambling board or gambling discussion board where this belongs and make more of reading for now than posting to avoid repeated mistakes in other aspects you aren't familiar yet with.

comments.author: Kalson9
comments.body: So why using the word is a pity,I will do so but thanks for it.
